PerformanceEventTimingToJSON.summary: The toJSON() method of the interface is a {{Glossary("Serialization","serializer")}}; it returns a JSON representation of the object.
PerformanceEventTimingToJSON.returns: A {{jsxref("JSON")}} object that is the serialization of the object.The JSON doesn't contain the property because it is of type , which doesn't provide a toJSON() operation.
